.. class:: warningmark
This tool is deprecated. Please use `the new fasta-only tool <root?tool_id=edu.tamu.cpt.fasta.stop_codons>`__. This change was made to make the tools less complicated and more obvious in their functionality. Currently this tool makes **assumptions** about your data which **may be wrong**.
**What it does**
This tool looks for CDS features and outputs summarizes the frequencies of their stop codons::
